---
name: "brief:tokens-hardening"
description: Propose/align design tokens and refactor a component to use them consistently.
agent: UX Prototyper
---

Target component/scope: ${selection}

Do:

1. Inventory existing tokens or styles.
2. Propose a minimal token set and naming.
3. Refactor one representative component to use tokens.
4. Document rules of the road.

Output:

- Token map
- Refactor summary
- Contributor rules
